City Council
============

[Meetings](https://www.burlesontx.com/177/Public-Notices)
---------------------------------------------------------

The following calendars include regular City Council meetings only.  
  
[2025 Council Calendar](https://www.burlesontx.com/DocumentCenter/View/34906/2025-Proposed-Calendar-Modified-080425)  
[2026 Council Calendar](https://www.burlesontx.com/DocumentCenter/View/35760/2026-Council-Mtg-Calendar-Updated)

\*Special City Council meetings will be called on an as needed basis and are not reflected on the annual Council Calendar.

For more information about meeting time and location view posted [agendas](https://www.burlesontx.com/177/Public-Notices).

![City Seal](https://www.burlesontx.com/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=21712)

* [Request a Proclamation](https://www.burlesontx.com/formcenter/application-for-boards-commissions-committees-7/request-a-city-proclamation-74)

To Contact Council ([email all members](http://www.burlesontx.com/FormCenter/Application-for-Boards-Commissions--Comm-7/Contact-your-City-Council-73)). Request an appearance [by Mayor orÂ City Council](https://www.burlesontx.com/FormCenter/Application-for-Boards-Commissions-Commi-7/Request-an-Appearance-by-the-Mayor-or-Ci-75).

Agendas, Minutes & Videos
-------------------------

To view the current council agenda -> [Public Notices](https://www.burlesontx.com/177/Public-Notices). [Archived Agendas & Minutes](https://burleson-tx.municodemeetings.com/). Access the [live video stream](https://www.burlesontx.com/880/Streaming-Video) during a regularly scheduled meeting or view [archived videos of previous meetings](http://burlesontx.swagit.com/city-council/ "archived videos of previous meetings").

Form of Government
------------------

The City of Burleson operates under a council-city manager form of government. Citizens are represented on the City Council by the mayor and 6 council members, all elected at large to serve 3-year terms.
